articles.author: Gerald Imray
articles.title: South Africa expels Israel's top diplomat in a move that could prompt a strong reaction from the US - AP News
articles.description: South Africa has declared Israel’s deputy ambassador persona non grata and ordered him to leave the country within 72 hours. The South African Foreign Ministry said it was expelling Ariel Seidman, the chargé d’affaires at the Israeli Embassy, because of repea…
articles.content: CAPE TOWN, South Africa (AP) South Africa ordered Israels deputy ambassador to leave the country within 72 hours on Friday, accusing him of undermining relations between the countries with social med… [+2966 chars]
